results.content: I have choosen this course because it combines regular PHP without design pattern and then shows the solution applying a specific design pattern to solve that problem. It is a really good approach for experienced programmers willing to start in design patterns. The best part, it is based on PHP code.
results.content_html: I have choosen this course because it combines regular PHP without design pattern and then shows the solution applying a specific design pattern to solve that problem. It is a really good approach for experienced programmers willing to start in design patterns. The best part, it is based on PHP code.

results.content: the course is fantastic but subtitle not good
results.content_html: the course is fantastic but subtitle not good

results.content:
It's a great course to have a quick introduction to Design Patterns in PHP, but I recommend everyone to have basic knowledge in PHP, mainly in Object-Oriented Programming before start it.
I had a great understanding of all the design patterns easily and I recommend this course.
I think everyone would have this knowledge to write good PHP code.
Thanks
